sources.title: 1937 Ball Im Metropol ( Heinrich George, Ilse Werner, Hilde Weissner)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1937. Ball im metropol.  U.a mit Heinrich George und Hilde Weissner

metadata.Plot: At a ball at the Metropol, the married Margit gives a harmless kiss to a one-time friend from her childhood and cousin, Eberhard. The two notice, however, that Margit's ill and jealous husband observed them from a distance.
metadata.Writer: Theodor Fontane, Wolf Neumeister, Ilse M. Spath
metadata.Actors: Heinrich George, Heinz von Cleve, Hilde Weissner
